articles.author: Jomy Jos Pullokaran
articles.title: SEBI introduces new framework for determining unaffected price in response to market rumours - CNBCTV18
articles.description: According to the new framework, if a rumour is confirmed within 24 hours of a material price movement, the unaffected price will be calculated by excluding the price impact of the rumour and its confirmation.
articles.content:
The Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI) on Tuesday (May 21) announced a new framework for considering the unaffected price of transactions following the confirmation of market rumours.
